web_snippets: Andrew Gallimore is known for One Night in Millstreet (2024), Troid Fhuilteach (A Bloody Canvas) (2008) and In Sunshine or in Shadow (2010).
Andrew Gallimore is a computational neurobiologist, pharmacologist, chemist, and writer who has been interested in the neural basis of psychedelic drug action ...
